name: Animal Warming
description:
ANIMAL WARMING ••• Endless Arcade Game •••

Hop without collision! Collect as much as you can! The more you collect, the harder it gets!

•••

Keys: WASD / mouse click and drag

•••

Actually the game is developed for mobile devices, but I wanted to make the PC version as well. Some assets are not yet complete, I will try to replace them as soon as possible.

Credits

art/code by HinkyWinky
